translations.translation: Have you thought about the sperm that you ejaculate?
Just consider (the semen) that you emit,
Did you ever consider the sperm that you emit?
Have you seen sperm?
So what is your opinion regarding the semen you discharge?
Do you not see the semen you emit.
Have you considered the seed?
Have you considered the seed you spill?
Have ye seen that which ye emit?
Have you thought about [the semen] that you discharge --
Behold! - that which ye emit.
Have you considered the sperm that you emit?
Do ye then see?- The (human Seed) that ye throw out,-
Then tell Me (about) the human semen that you emit.
Have you thought about what (sperm) you ejaculate?
Have you seen what you ejaculate?
Have you seen that which you emit?
[56:58] Have you considered the sperm that you emit?, the sperm you spill in the wombs of women?
(Have ye seen that which ye emit) in the wombs of women?

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { أَفَرَأَيْتُمْ مَّا تُمْنُونَ } معناه من المَنى

translations.translation: And His saying, "Do you see what you desire?" Its meaning is from the [perspective of] the desired one.

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { أفرأيتم ما تُمْنُون } أي: تقذفونه في الأرحام من النُطف
